title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.25 - Town of Cheektowaga
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8114.25 - Town of Cheektowaga

State Regulations
(a) Route
277. The northbound and southbound roadways of Union Road, Route 277, between

Walden Avenue, SH 9411, and 0.4 mile south of Broadway, Route 130. (b) Route 130. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Broadway, Route 130, between Route 277 and Route 78. (c) Dick Road. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Dick Road between Walden Avenue, SH 9411, and Broadway, Route
130. (d) Buell Avenue. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Buell Avenue from Genesee Street, Route
33, for a distance of 850+- feet. (e) French Road. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of French Road between Union Road, Route 277, and Azalea

Drive. (f) Azalea Drive. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Azalea Drive between French Road and the
terminus of Azalea Drive. (g) Industrial Parkway. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Industrial Parkway
between Azalea Drive and the terminus of Industrial Parkway. (h) Peppy Place. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Peppy Place between Walden Avenue, SH 9411, and Dale

Road. (i) Dale Road. The eastbound
and westbound roadways of Dale Road between Peppy Place and Anderson

Road. (j) Anderson Road. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Anderson Road between Dale Road and a
point 1200+- feet north of Dale Road. (k) Aero Drive. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Aero Drive between Route 78, Transit Road, and Scotts

Place. (l) SH 9411. SH 9411, Walden

Avenue, between exit 52 of I-90 and Route 240. (m) Gardenville Parkway West. The eastbound
and westbound roadways of Gardenville Parkway West between Union Road, Route
277 and Empire Drive. (n) [Eff. until April 21, 1993, see also subd. (n) below.] Route 33. Route 33, Genesee

Street, between Route 33, the Kensington Expressway, and Holtz Road. (n) [Eff. April 21, 1993, see also subd. (n)
above.] Route 33. Route 33, Genesee Street, between Route 33, Kensington

Expressway and Route 78. (o) Route
130. Route 130 between Union Road and Harlem Road. (p) [Eff. until July 15, 1992, see also subd. (p) below.] Route 240. Route 240 between Walden Avenue (SH 9411) and Route
130. (p) [Eff. July 15, 1992 until

Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (p) above and below.] Route 240. Route 240
between Route 952Q (Walden Avenue) and Franklin Avenue. (p) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996 until April 30, 1997, see also subd. (p) above and below.] Route 240 (Harlem Road). Route 240 (Harlem

Road) between Dingens Street and Route 33 (Kensington Expressway). (p) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see also subd. (p)
above.] Route 240. Route 240 between Dingens Street and Route 33. (q) Allied Drive between Route 130 (Broadway)
and the southerly end of Allied Drive. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8114.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
